# Discovering OpenSees - Parallel & Grid Computing

This seminar will occur May 31 and June 1, 2012

Register for the seminar:

  • May 31 at 4:00 pm Pacific Time registration link 1
  • June 1 at 10:00 am Pacific Time registration link 2

In this seminar we will provide a brief introduction to Parallel and Grid Computing with OpenSees using the resources made available to you through NEEShub.

This seminar covers:

  • Introduction to Parallel & Grid Computing.
  • Parallel Computing With OpenSees
  • Running Parallel Examples on NEEShub
  • Grid Computing Using Pegasus, the Open Science Grid and OpenSees.

Seminar Material

Video of the seminar can be found here:
